scripts.native: cd apps/expo && npx expo prebuild && yarn start
scripts.fix: manypkg fix  && cd apps/expo && npx expo install --fix
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --all --exclude next-app run build
scripts.yarn:versionPatch:web-core: cd packages/web/components/core && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionPatch
scripts.yarn:versionMinor:web-core: cd packages/web/components/core && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionMinor
scripts.yarn:versionMajor:web-core: cd packages/web/components/core && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionMajor
scripts.yarn:versionPatch:web-forms: cd packages/web/components/forms && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionPatchFormsWeb
scripts.yarn:versionMinor:web-forms: cd packages/web/components/forms && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionMinorFormsWeb
scripts.yarn:versionMajor:web-forms: cd packages/web/components/forms && yarn workspaces foreach -A run versionMajorFormsWeb
scripts.yarn:npmPublish:web-core: cd packages/web/components/core && yarn workspaces foreach -A run npmPublish
scripts.yarn:npmPublish:web-forms: cd packages/web/components/core && yarn workspaces foreach -A run npmPublishFormsWeb
